SourceText: 我D普通話好屎，成日俾人笑係「港普」，不過去旅行都叫溝通到。
TargetText: My Mandarin is so bad that I get laughed at for speaking with a thick Hong Kong accent, but still I can kinda make myself understood when I travel.

SourceText: 啲衫既然已經唔啱着，不如睇下有冇NGO會接收？環保得嚟又幫到人。
TargetText: Since the clothes no longer fit, why not see if any NGOs will accept? It's good for the envrionment and it helps people.

SourceText: 我今日啱啱十八週，雖然唔係第一胎，但係感受到BB喺我肚入面郁都仲係覺得好奇妙。
TargetText: I'm exactly 18 weeks today, and even though it's not my first baby, it still feels amazing to feel the baby move in my belly.

SourceText: 你唔通廿年後都靠外父養咩？好心你就腳踏實地出去揾工啦。
TargetText: You wouldn't be relying on your father-in-law to support you fiancially in 20 years, would you? For god's sake you should be realistic and look for a job.

SourceText: 我哋諗住下個weekend去鳳凰山睇日出，你有無興趣一齊？
TargetText: We are planning to go to Lantau Peak to watch the sunrise next weekend. Would you like to join us?

SourceText: 你唔好睇阿伯身光頸靚呀，佢出左名孤寒，一蚊貼士都唔會俾㗎。
TargetText: Don't look at how well-dressed the old man is. He is notoriously stingy and won't give him a single dollar tip.

SourceText: 佢最大嘅心願就係希望啲仔女快啲成家立室。
TargetText: His biggest wish is that his children will get married and start their families soon.

SourceText: 忍一忍先，啲牙會有啲痺嘅，等啲麻醉生效之後就會好好多。
TargetText: Bear with it for a while. Your teeth will be a bit numb. It will be much better after the anesthesia takes effect.

SourceText: 你唔好高估自己酒量呀，頂唔順就坐低挨下先，再唔係call車返屋企先。
TargetText: Don't overestimate how much you can drink. If you can't handle it, just sit down and relax, or call a car to take you home.

SourceText: 啲靚仔玩捉迷藏呢，至鍾意匿喺窗簾後面嘅。
TargetText: When kids play hide-and-seek, their favorite hiding spot is often behind the curtains.

SourceText: 尋日場show散場嗰陣，幾千人衝去巴士站等車，好彩我走得快排到隊頭。
TargetText: When the show ended yesterday, thousands of people rushed to the bus stop. Luckily, I left early enough to be at the front of the line.

SourceText: 隻Game有好多關㗎，我玩咗成個禮拜未爆機。
TargetText: The game has many levels. I've been playing it for the entire week and still haven't beaten the game.

SourceText: 細個嗰陣阿媽成日嚇我，話唔聽話亂走嘅話會俾丫烏捉走。
TargetText: When I was a child, my mom used to scare me by saying that if I was disobedient and ran around, a monster would catch me.

SourceText: 間屋最大賣點就係依個落地玻璃加無敵大海景，好似去咗露天風呂咁樣。
TargetText: The biggest selling point of the house is the floor-to-ceiling glass window with an unparalleled sea view, making it feel like a Japanese outdoor onsen.

SourceText: 間酒店有啲隔涉喎，等咗三個字都冇的士肯入嚟。
TargetText: The hotel is so remote that I waited for 15 minutes but no taxis would come to pick me up.

SourceText: 咁大雨落山仲要揸咁快，你當自己係賽車手呀？
TargetText: You're driving too fast downhill in heavy rain. Do you think you're a car racer?

SourceText: 前排轉工有一個月嘅gap，去咗一轉南美睇馬丘比丘同天空之鏡。
TargetText: There was a one-month gap when I changed jobs not long ago, so I went to South America to see Machu Picchu and the Mirror of the Sky.
